name: Zombidarity
description:
Zombidarity is a Horror Zombie Slasher which has been created for the Stay Safe Jam between 27. and 29. march 2020. This project was developed by Dominik Geuer as part of the Stay Safe Jam 2020, the theme of which is „solidarity“. The intention was to develop a Zombie Slasher where the zombies also represent „parasites“. Kill the parasites for humanity.


The whole project was developed by Dominik Geuer solo and following assets were used:

Environment
Unreal Marketplace - HQ Abandoned School, Infinity Blade Grasslands,

Characters & Animations
Mixamo.com

Sound Effects & Music
Freesound.org, Music from Stay Safe Jam Sponsored Music Database

UI & HUD
Self-Developed + Unreal Marketplace - HQUI Buttons (My own assets), Competitive Shooter HUD (My own asset)

Blood & Gore Effects
Quixel Megascans + one particle effect from Unreal Marketplace -> Ballistics FX

AI + Cinematics + Gameplay Programming + Character Programming + Project Framework etc.
Self-Developed
